conclusion: Analyze the flow direction and path of liquid through baffles to determine which container it will flow into.
Baffle A: Liquid flows from top left corner towards bottom right.
Baffle B: Liquid flows from top right corner towards bottom left.
Baffle C: Liquid flows from top right corner towards bottom left.
Combined effect of baffles A and B directs liquid towards bottom left.
Combined effect of baffles B and C directs liquid towards bottom left.
Overall direction after all baffles is towards bottom left.
Liquid will flow into the container located in the bottom left area, which is container E.
Final Answer: Liquid will flow into container E.
